headline: American Water Appoints New Independent Member to the Board of Directors
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., August 27, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) announced today that on August 26, 2025, Lisa A. Grow was appointed as an independent member of the company's board of directors, effective immediately.
